mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno} AND writer = #{writer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (bno, title, content, writer) VALUES (board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as bnum, b.* FROM (SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY bno DESC) b) WHERE bnum BETWEEN #{beginPage} AND #{endPage}
